text: Panoramic view of the park from north to south (2016). Parque La Alameda is a park in the Old Centre part of Quito, Ecuador. It is located southeast of Parque Julio Montevelle and east of Parque de La Basílica. It contains a notable equestrian monument of Simon Bolivar and an astronomical observatory in the centre. ==References== Category:Parks in Quito
title: Parque La Alameda
